title: Implement multi-factor authentication for secure login
description: As a customer, I want to securely log in using multi-factor authentication, so that my sensitive data is protected.
attributes_and_rules: Include OTP-based verification, biometrics, and device recognition.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customer is able to log in using OTP.
2. Customer is able to log in using biometrics.
3. System recognizes customer device for subsequent logins.
test_cases:
Given a customer, when they log in with OTP, then access is granted if the OTP is correct.
Given a customer, when they log in with biometrics, then the system verifies the biometrics and grants access.
Given a customer, when they log in from a recognized device, then the system grants access without additional verification.

title: Develop responsive web interface
description: As a customer, I want to access the portal from any device, so that I can have a consistent and optimal user experience.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure optimal user experience across all device types with consistent layout, performance, and accessibility.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Portal layout adjusts seamlessly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
2. Performance remains consistent across different devices.
3. Navigation and usability are user-friendly on all device types.
test_cases:
Given a customer, when they access the portal on a desktop, then the layout should be optimized for a large screen.
Given a customer, when they access the portal on a tablet, then the layout should be optimized for medium screen size.
Given a customer, when they access the portal on a mobile device, then the layout should be mobile-friendly.

title: Create personalized dashboard based on user profile
description: As a customer, I want to see a personalized dashboard, so that I can quickly access relevant products and services.
attributes_and_rules: Display relevant banking products and services based on user profile and transaction history.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Dashboard displays products and services tailored to user's profile.
2. Real-time data feeds ensure up-to-date information.
3. Quick access to actions like transfers and service requests is available.
test_cases:
Given a customer, when they log in, then the dashboard should display personalized product recommendations.
Given a customer, when they check their account summary, then the information should be up-to-date.
Given a customer, when they want to perform an action, then the dashboard provides quick access to the action.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Enable online account opening and service modifications
description: As a customer, I want to open accounts and modify services online, so that I can manage my banking needs efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Automate input validation and provide contextual help to minimize manual intervention.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers can successfully apply for new accounts online.
2. Existing services can be updated without manual intervention.
3. Contextual help guides customers through the process.
test_cases:
Given a customer, when they start an account opening process, then the system guides them step-by-step.
Given a customer, when they update a service, then the system automates the input validation.
Given a customer, when they need help, then the system provides contextual assistance.

title: Integrate secure document upload functionality
description: As a customer, I want to securely upload documents, so that I can authenticate and verify my identity online.
attributes_and_rules: Support multiple file formats and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers can upload documents in multiple formats.
2. The system validates uploaded documents.
3. Backend workflows verify document authenticity.
test_cases:
Given a customer, when they upload a document, then the system accepts multiple file formats.
Given a customer, when a document is uploaded, then the system validates the document.
Given a customer, when a document is uploaded, then the backend verifies its authenticity.

title: Implement save-and-resume feature for incomplete applications
description: As a customer, I want to save and resume my application, so that I do not lose progress if I need to pause.
attributes_and_rules: Support draft persistence, version control, and encrypted storage.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers can save their progress mid-application.
2. The system maintains version control of drafts.
3. Saved drafts are securely stored with encryption.
test_cases:
Given a customer, when they save an application, then the progress is persisted.
Given a customer, when they resume an application, then the system retrieves the saved progress.
Given a customer, when they save an application, then the draft is encrypted and stored securely.

title: Enable real-time tracking and notifications for requests
description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my requests in real-time, so that I stay informed about their progress.
attributes_and_rules: Integrate automated email and in-portal notifications for status updates.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers can view the real-time status of their requests.
2. Automated notifications are sent on status changes.
3. Customers receive timely updates on approvals or rejections.
test_cases:
Given a customer, when they submit a request, then they can track its status in real-time.
Given a customer, when the status of their request changes, then they receive an automated notification.
Given a customer, when their request is approved or rejected, then they receive a timely update.

title: Implement detailed interaction history and audit log
description: As a customer, I want to view my interaction history, so that I can track my service activities and ensure compliance.
attributes_and_rules: Retain detailed records of all transactions and interactions.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers can view their complete interaction history.
2. System retains and secures detailed records for compliance.
3. Audit logs are maintained with data security.
test_cases:
Given a customer, when they check their interaction history, then the system shows all their activities.
Given a customer, when they perform a transaction, then the system logs the details.
Given a customer, when they request support, then the interactions are logged for compliance.

title: Integrate portal with core banking systems
description: As a customer, I want seamless data synchronization with the core banking system, so that my account information is always accurate.
attributes_and_rules: Enable secure, real-time exchange of data with minimal latency.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Portal synchronizes data with the core banking system in real-time.
2. Secure exchange of account, transaction, and service data is ensured.
3. Minimal latency and operational isolation are maintained.
test_cases:
Given a customer, when they update their account, then the information is synchronized with the core banking system in real-time.
Given a customer, when they view their transaction history, then the data is accurate and up-to-date.
Given a customer, when the core banking system updates data, then the changes are reflected in the portal with minimal latency.

title: Implement role-based access control
description: As a customer, I want role-based access control, so that I only have access to actions and data that I am authorized for.
attributes_and_rules: Define permissions and access levels based on user profile and role.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Permissions and access levels are defined and enforced.
2. Customers can only view and perform authorized actions.
3. Compliance and data security are maintained across the portal.
test_cases:
Given a customer, when they log in, then their access is restricted based on their role.
Given a customer, when they attempt to access unauthorized data, then the system prevents access.
Given a customer, when they perform actions, then the system checks their permissions.

epic_title: Independent Portal Database and Performance Optimization
title: Optimize portal database for performance
description: As a system administrator, I want an optimized portal database, so that the system's performance and reliability are enhanced.
attributes_and_rules: Implement dedicated database architecture with indexing, caching, and asynchronous processing.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Portal database manages application-specific data independently.
2. Indexing and caching improve query performance.
3. Asynchronous processing ensures system scalability and reliability.
test_cases:
Given a system administrator, when they configure the database, then the system manages data separately from the core banking database.
Given a system administrator, when they implement indexing, then query performance is improved.
Given a system administrator, when they enable asynchronous processing, then the system handles high loads efficiently.
